menus.name: Americano
menus.description: A type of coffee drink prepared by diluting an espresso with hot water, giving it a similar strength to, but different flavor from, traditionally brewed coffee.

menus.name: Cappuccino
menus.description: An espresso based coffee drink that originated in Italy and is prepared with steamed milk foam.

menus.name: Flat White
menus.description: A coffee drink consisting of espresso with microfoam.

menus.name: Latte
menus.description: A milk coffee that boasts a silky layer of foam as a real highlight to the drink. A true latte will be made up of one or two shots of espresso, steamed milk and a final, thin layer of frothed milk on top.

menus.name: Macchiato
menus.description: An espresso coffee drink with a small amount of milk, usually foamed. In Italian, macchiato means 'stained' or 'spotted', so the literal translation of caffè macchiato is 'stained coffee' or 'marked coffee'.

menus.name: Mocha
menus.description: A chocolate-flavoured warm beverage that is a variant of a caffè latte.

menus.name: Black Currant
menus.description: Black currant tea is a caffeine free drink made from the leaves and the dried fruits from the black currant bush. A pungent, fruity drink, black currant tea has a full bodied fruit flavor similar to berries. It is packed with antioxidants, vitamins, and minerals and offers a great deal of therapeutic value.

menus.name: Earl Grey
menus.description: Earl Grey tea has one defining ingredient, bergamot, an orange fruit. It is commonly grown in parts of Italy. it is a hybrid of lemon and bitter orange.

menus.name: Green Tea
menus.description: Green tea is a type of tea that is harvested and then quickly preserved. Whereas black tea leaves are allowed to oxidize after they are picked, green tea leaves are immediately heated to prevent oxidation. Oxidation is a natural process.

menus.name: Peppermint
menus.description: Peppermint tea is a popular herbal tea that is naturally calorie- and caffeine-free. Some research has suggested that the oils in peppermint may have a number of other health benefits, such as fresher breath, better digestion, and reduced pain from headaches. Peppermint tea also has antibacterial properties.

menus.name: Rooibos
menus.description: Rooibos tea is a red herbal tea that comes from the fermented leaves of the Aspalathus linearis shrub, a plant native to South Africa. Many people enjoy it as an alternative to green or black tea. Unfermented green rooibos tea is also available. Rooibos tea has a sweet, delicate, and earthy flavor.

menus.name: Spiced Chai
menus.description: Spiced chai is a ginger tea made with cream, strong black tea, and ginger. The type of chai most commonly served as chai in the United States is masala chai. It, too, is flexible in terms of spices and flavors, but there are six ingredients that are pretty consistently used in masala chai. Cardamom Cardamom is a versatile spice that grows in hot, humid climates such as southern India, Guatemala, and Tanzania. It adds distinct flavor to both sweet and savory dishes.

menus.name: Italian Wedding
menus.description: This Italian wedding soup is a marriage of homemade mini meatballs, colorful vegetables, and pearl couscous.

menus.name: Clam Chowder
menus.description: Clam chowder is a moniker used to describe just about any soup that contains clams and broth. Most clam chowders are also made with potatoes, onions, or celery, while some even add in bacon. Oyster or saltine crackers almost always accompany the soup.

menus.name: French Onion
menus.description: French Onion is a soup usually based on meat stock and onions, and often served gratinéed with croutons or a larger piece of bread covered with cheese floating on top.

menus.name: Lobster Bisque
menus.description: Lobster bisque soup follows the traditional definition of a bisque. It includes lobster and has a luscious, creamy, smooth tomato-based broth.

menus.name: Minestrone
menus.description: Minestrone is a thick soup of Italian origin made with vegetables, often with the addition of pasta or rice, sometimes both. Common ingredients include beans, onions, celery, carrots, leaf vegetables, stock, parmesan cheese and tomatoes.

menus.name: Tomato Basil
menus.description: A delicious tomato based soup with heavy cream, chopped basil, sugar, salt and pepper. Served with croutons.

menus.name: Caesar
menus.description: Caesar salad is infused with the fresh and zesty flavors of lime, anchovies, olive oil, egg and garlic.

menus.name: Crab Louie
menus.description: The main ingredient for Crab Louie, as the name suggests, is crab meat. The preferred crab is Dungeness Crab, but other crab meat can be substituted, including cheaper imitation crab meat. Although variations of the recipe exist, an essential ingredient is a creamy dressing such as Louis dressing, Thousand Island dressing or Green goddess dressing.

menus.name: Nicoise
menus.description: Nicoise is essentially a French composed salad, much like our American Cobb salad, but with tuna, green beans, and potatoes, instead of chicken, bacon, and avocado. Salad Niçoise hails from Nice, on the Mediterranean Sea, though like so many foods we enjoy here of French origin, has changed a bit to adapt to our tastes.

menus.name: Steak Cobb
menus.description: Steak Cobb in a bowl layer in the salad greens, tomatoes, egg, cheese and avocado slices. Sprinkle all with salt and pepper. Once the steak has rested slice thin strips against the grain.

menus.name: Wedge
menus.description: A classic wedge salad is the perfect start or side to a steakhouse dinner, barbecue, or four-course meal. Load a simple iceberg wedge with homemade blue cheese dressing, crumbled bacon, chopped tomatoes, and tangy pickled onions. It could not be simpler in its elegance, and is a favored method of adding acid and vegetables to a rich meal.

menus.name: Waldorf Chicken
menus.description: This Waldorf Chicken Salad is a refreshing and filling dish loaded with fruit, veggies, and nuts.

menus.name: BLT
menus.description: A BLT is a type of sandwich, named for the initials of its primary ingredients, bacon, lettuce, and tomato.

menus.name: Chicken Wrap
menus.description: Simply mix together a cream cheese, sour cream, Cheddar cheese, green onions, and mustard, and roll up the mixture in a tortilla along with shredded chicken and cabbage.

menus.name: Cucumber
menus.description: This simple, elegant staple of the famous British afternoon tea, known as cucumber sandwich, is a concoction made with crustless triangles of lightly buttered white bread that is filled with paper-thin cucumber slices, a little bit of salt, and a dash of lemon juice.

menus.name: Monte Cristo
menus.description: A Monte Cristo sandwich is an egg-dipped ham and cheese sandwich that is pan or deep fried, a variation of the French croque monsieur.

menus.name: Reuben
menus.description: The Reuben sandwich is a North American grilled sandwich composed of corned beef, Swiss cheese, sauerkraut, and Thousand Island dressing or Russian dressing, grilled between slices of rye bread.

menus.name: Turkey Club
menus.description: This club sandwich is made with cooked turkey, lettuce, slices of fresh ripe tomato, crispy and crunchy bacon, and cranberry sauce in between toasted white bread slathered with mayo.

menus.name: Banana Foster
menus.description: Bananas Foster is an American dessert that originated in New Orleans made with cooked bananas served in a butter, brown sugar and rum sauce. The caramelized liquor-based sauce is often prepared via flambé.

menus.name: Carrot Cake
menus.description: Carrot cake, also known as passion cake, is cake that contains carrots mixed into the batter. Most modern carrot cake recipes have a white cream cheese frosting. Sometimes nuts such as walnuts or pecans are added into the cake batter, as well as spices such as cinnamon, ginger and ground mixed spice.

menus.name: Cheesecake
menus.description: Cheesecake is a sweet dessert consisting of one or more layers. The main, and thickest, layer consists of a mixture of a soft, fresh cheese, typically cottage cheese, cream cheese or ricotta, eggs, and sugar.

menus.name: Creme Brulee
menus.description: Crème brûlée or crème brulée , also known as burnt cream or Trinity cream, and virtually identical to the original crema catalana, is a dessert consisting of a rich custard base topped with a layer of hardened caramelized sugar.

menus.name: Tiramisu
menus.description: Tiramisu is a coffee-flavoured Italian dessert. It is made of ladyfingers dipped in coffee, layered with a whipped mixture of eggs, sugar, and mascarpone cheese, flavoured with cocoa.

menus.name: Tuxedo Cake
menus.description: Tuxedo Cake is a rich chocolate cake with double chocolate filling, both white and dark chocolate, and a swirled chocolate topping. This decadent triple layer chocolate cake recipe is so delicious, and can be made for any occasion!

comments.text: This simple cup of coffee warmed my soul!
comments.author: Simon Hunt

comments.text: The froth was devine!
comments.author: Zandra Katherine

comments.text: Creamy and delicious, the patterns in the milk are cute!
comments.author: Amy Keophilavong

comments.text: My absolute favorite style of coffee, simple and sweet.
comments.author: Jean Luc

comments.text: This has been our favorite cafe for over 7 years. It is an absolutely beautiful site. The hosts are very friendly and helpful. Don't forget to try out the macchiato, it is perfection!

comments.text: There's nothing more fun than drinking this mocha in a rainstorm.
comments.author: Juan Cortez

comments.text: This tea is the best tea, absolutely no competion out there!
comments.author: McKenzie Sebastian

comments.text: Sweet, aromatic, earl grey tea helps me wake up every morning! I stop by before work to get my day started!
comments.author: Brennen Ech

comments.text: Love the warm delicious taste of this green tea!
comments.author: Amy Keophilavong

comments.text: A wonderful place to reconnect with friends and family. This tea cleared my mind to talk for hours!
comments.author: Jordan Runn

comments.text: This sweet spiced tea is so unique!
comments.author: Olaf the Snowman

comments.text: This is authentically delightful!

comments.text: The best Italian wedding soup I have ever had!

comments.text: This clam chowder is hearty and delcious!
comments.author: Amy Keophilavong

comments.text: Perfect soup for you and your friends!

comments.text: The pieces of lobster were huge!
comments.author: Markell Richards

comments.text: Such a variety of flavors and ingredients!
comments.author: Amy Keophilavong

comments.text: What a magnificent view! The staff is amazing, and the food even more than them. The tomato basil soup is my favorite!

comments.text: The best caesar in town!

comments.text: The photos don't do justice to the beauty of this place.

comments.text: The best salad I have ever had. Good luck pronouncing it!

comments.text: The steak was cook perfectly and the medley of ingredients were so good!
comments.author: Trinity Smith

comments.text: Simply good, just order it! The wedge is yummy!
comments.author: Chloe Chen

comments.text: The entire experience was amazing! I have never had this salad before but I will order it again!
comments.author: Lauren Reynolds

comments.text: Bacon Lettuce Tomato, all one could possible need in life!
comments.author: Joe Wallace

comments.text: A light and fresh chicken wrap that filled my tummy up!
comments.author: Susan Elks

comments.text: This went perfectly with my earl grey tea! I felt like royalty.
comments.author: Patricia Stone

comments.text: The best sandwhich I have every had, make sure to dip it in the jam!
comments.author: Trisha Clay

comments.text: This will fill you up big time. So much meat!
comments.author: John Doe

comments.text: My son is a picky eater and he just loved this!
comments.author: Zoey Dirsch

comments.text: I had this once before in New Orleans and this on is just as good as that one!
comments.author: Matt Herrington

comments.text: Best cake for a date night!
comments.author: Chelsea Clark

comments.text: Simply good, just order it! The cheesecake is scrumptious!
comments.author: Chance Hill

comments.text: Crispy on the outside, creamy on the inside!
comments.author: Brandon Halls

comments.text: My favorite cake ever!
comments.author: Amber Ried

comments.text: Fancy and yummy! What is there not to love?
comments.author: Kelly Tran

maids.name: Misaki
maids.description: Misaki is a student council president of Seika High.

maids.name: Mey-Rin
maids.description: Mey-Rin is a determined, strong-willed sniper who seeks to prove her worth.

maids.name: Tsumugi
maids.description: Tsumugi plays the keyboard and is the main musical composer in the band Ho-kago Tea Time.

maids.name: Rem
maids.description: Rem tends to speak in a superficially polite manner and sometimes acts without thinking.

banquets.name: Royal Ballroom
banquets.description: Royal Ballroom is a hidden gem of elegance and classic old European style charm perfect for beautiful Weddings and Events.

banquets.name: Executive Suite
banquets.description: The executive suite is an office property that provides tenants with a smaller portion of office space compared to when you purchase commercial real estate outright.

banquets.name: Presidents Room
banquets.description: A warm space for small lectures, seminars and meetings featuring a stage and annex.

banquets.name: Queens Gardens
banquets.description: The Perfect Location for Your Event Let Royal Garden Banquet Hall be the location of your dream event.
